page.title: 08EDUCATION WYESHAM
page.content: {A GWENT JUNIOR SCHOOL WITH 83 PUPILS {A TYPICAL DAY WITH SECOND-YEAR PUPILS 9.00 School starts with Assembly. In Assembly we sing hymns and have a story. Then we have the results of the {House Points}for each House. 9.25-10.40 At this time we do reading quiz or{Spelling}Workshop.In Spelling Workshop we have different levels. On the cards there are 4 words.You have to put them in a book and then on to a sheet of paper.After 10 cards we do a test. 10.40-10.55 Playtime; outside if its sunny; inside if its wet. 10.55-11.50 At this time we go in to the hall to do creative writing. 11.50-12.00 Multiplication tables. 12.00-13.00{Lunchtime and playtime. 13.00-14.30 Zigzag work or Geography, History, Maths. or English. l4.30-14.45 Playtime.l4.45-l5.30 Story
